paid_tier.limits: Pay-as-you-go: 2000 RPM for Flash, 1000 RPM for Pro

Google Gemini.notes: Free tier includes 2M context window. Text Embedding also free up to 1500 req/day

free_tier.limits: Web: Limited messages/day on claude.ai. No free API tier

paid_tier.limits: API: Pay per token. Pro: $20/mo for 5x limits. Team: $25-30/user/mo

Anthropic Claude.notes: Free web chat available. API requires payment. Desktop app available

free_tier.limits: ChatGPT: Free tier with GPT-3.5. API: $5 credit for new accounts

paid_tier.limits: ChatGPT Plus: $20/mo. API: Pay per token with rate limits by tier

OpenAI.notes: Free ChatGPT includes limited GPT-4o access. API pricing varies by model

free_tier.limits: Limited free access via X Premium ($8-16/mo required)

paid_tier.limits: API: Pay per token. X Premium+ for higher limits

xAI Grok.notes: Requires X (Twitter) Premium subscription for access

Sourcegraph Cody.notes: VS Code, JetBrains, Neovim extensions. Context-aware code AI

free_tier.limits: Free tier with limited AI requests per month

Warp AI.notes: AI-powered terminal for MacOS/Linux. Command search, explanations

Augment.notes: VS Code extension. Code completion, refactoring, documentation

free_tier.limits: Free: Limited searches per day with standard AI

Perplexity AI.notes: AI search engine. API in beta. Mobile apps available

free_tier.limits: Unlimited basic access with 2M character context, 10 docs/day, queuing during peak

paid_tier.limits: Pro: ~$7/mo, Ultra: ~$49/mo (70M tokens). API: $0.15/M input, $2.50/M output

Moonshot Kimi.notes: Chinese 'ChatGPT'. Massive 2M char context. Open-source K2 under Apache 2.0. Ultra-competitive pricing

free_tier.limits: Free tier in Singapore region only. Limited quota. Via OpenRouter: free tier available

Alibaba Qwen.notes: Alibaba's family. Open-source models. 128K-1M context. Thinking mode available. Very competitive pricing

free_tier.limits: Free web chat (unlimited with throttling). Promotional API credits for new users

paid_tier.limits: API: $0.028/M (cache hit), $0.28/M input, $0.42/M output. 50-75% off-peak discount

DeepSeek.notes: Extremely cheap! ~90% cheaper than OpenAI. 128K context. Open-source. MIT license. Chinese company

free_tier.limits: Le Chat: Free with ~25 msgs, Flash answers, docs. API: Free tier for prototyping

paid_tier.limits: Pro: $15/mo. API: Medium 3 ~$0.10/M, Large ~$2/M input. Codestral competitive

Mistral AI.notes: European (French). Apache 2.0 open models. Zero-retention option. Very competitive pricing

free_tier.limits: Trial API key: 5K generation units/mo, 100 calls/min. Free for prototyping. 1K calls/mo total

paid_tier.limits: Production (pay-as-you-go): Command A: $2.50/M in, $10/M out. Command R: $0.15/M, $0.60/M

Cohere.notes: Enterprise-focused. Strong embeddings/rerank. OpenAI-compatible API. Custom models available

free_tier.limits: Hobby: 2K completions/mo, 50 premium requests. 2-week Pro trial

paid_tier.limits: Pro: $20/mo ($20 API credit). Pro+: $60/mo (1500 reqs). Ultra: $200/mo (20x usage)

Cursor.notes: AI-first code editor. Fork of VS Code. Multi-model support. Composer for multi-file edits. Pricing controversies

free_tier.limits: Free: 2K completions/mo, 50 premium reqs. Free for students/teachers/OSS maintainers

paid_tier.limits: Pro: $10/mo (300 premium). Pro+: $39/mo (1500 reqs). Business: $19/user. Enterprise: $39/user

GitHub Copilot.notes: Microsoft-owned. Best IDE integration. VS Code, JetBrains, etc. Chat in Business+. Popular with enterprises

free_tier.limits: Open source, free to use. Pricing depends on hosting provider.

paid_tier.limits: Varies by provider (e.g., AWS, Replicate, Groq). Pay-per-use.

Meta Llama.notes: Open source models from Meta. Can be self-hosted or used via cloud providers.

free_tier.limits: Free tier with monthly token and compute hour limits.

paid_tier.limits: Pay-as-you-go per million tokens. Subscription plans available.

IBM Watsonx.notes: Enterprise-focused AI and data platform. Offers a suite of tools for building, scaling, and governing AI.

free_tier.limits: $10 credit for new users, valid for 3 months.

paid_tier.limits: Pay-as-you-go per token. J2-Mid: $12.5/M tokens, J2-Ultra: $18.8/M tokens.

free_tier.limits: Free access to models and datasets. Free tier for Spaces.
models: Vast collection of open source models

paid_tier.limits: PRO account ($9/mo), Team plan ($20/user/mo), Enterprise Hub (from $50/user/mo). Pay-as-you-go for compute.
models: Vast collection of open source models

Hugging Face.notes: Platform for hosting and collaborating on ML models, datasets, and applications.
